typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Emp ID} as integer,
		Name as string,
		County as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Age in Company} as double,
		Salary as integer,
		Department as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpData
EmpData derive(Country = upper(County),
		Country_Newlist = iif(isNull(County),'Unknown',upper(County))) ~> DerivedColCntry
DerivedColCntry split(equals(Department, 1),
	equals(Department, 2),
	equals(Department, 3),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(IT, HR, PAYROLL, UnknownDep)
ConditionalSplit1@IT, ConditionalSplit1@HR, ConditionalSplit1@PAYROLL, ConditionalSplit1@UnknownDep union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sort(asc(Name, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		{Emp ID},
		ID,
		{Emp Name} = Name,
		County,
		Gender,
		{Age in Company},
		Salary,
		Department,
		Country,
		Country_Newlist
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		{SALE COUNTRY} as string,
		VEH_SOURCE as string,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC} as string,
		{Mnemonic Only} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE} as string,
		TCODE as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT} as string,
		{Regional Segment Concat or DRI SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL} as string,
		TRIM as string,
		Electric as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE} as string,
		DOORS as string,
		DRIVETYPE as string,
		{LAST UPDATE} as string,
		SERIES as string,
		TYPE_F as string,
		{SECTION WIDTH} as string,
		{ASPECT RATIO} as string,
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{RIM DIAMETER} as string,
		{LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		FRONT_SIZE as string,
		CORE_F_SIZE as string,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B} as string,
		TYPE_R as string,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH} as string,
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO} as string,
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER} as string,
		{REAR LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		REAR_SIZE as string,
		CORE_R_SIZE as string,
		{TIRE PARENT} as string,
		TIRE_BRAND as string,
		TIRE_MODEL as string,
		{Tire Category} as string,
		{Vehicle App} as string,
		Segment as string,
		{Reporting Segment} as string,
		{Tire Designation} as string,
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING} as string,
		SIDEWALL as string,
		{WHEEL TYPE} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL (INTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		PRES_MON as string,
		MON_SUPP as string,
		{SPARE DETAIL (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		{Updated Segment} as string,
		{Updated Bodytype} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class} as string,
		{Global Sales Segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Sub-segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Price Class} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Program} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL} as string,
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL} as string,
		Name as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Output_Trmsfr_Activity.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
